Message:
A healer’s job is to heal people’s
wounds and soothe their hearts.

When I was injured
and crying alone in
the middle of the woods,
the one who saved me
was a gentle healer.

The medicinal herbs
she used burned as they
soaked into the wound...

But, she consoled me until
all of my tears had dried.

Even when she learned
I was a witch, her attitude
toward me never changed.

She also taught me
something very important.

“Anyone who gets
injured feels pain,
be they witch or not.”

I want to help people in need...
just like what she did for me.

To be someone who wraps
all wounded hearts in love...
That is the kind of healer
I aspire to be...
